mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ebd_market (num, writer, title, salesType, salesStatus, imgpath, content, viewcnt, regdate) VALUES(ebd_market_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{salesType}, #{salesStatus}, #{imgpath}, #{content}, 0 , SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, salesType, salesStatus, imgpath, content, viewcnt, ebd_market.regdate, profile FROM ebd_market, ebd_users
WHERE (title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%') AND (ebd_market.writer=ebd_users.nick)
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' AND (ebd_market.writer=ebd_users.nick)
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%' AND (ebd_market.writer=ebd_users.nick)
WHERE ebd_market.writer=ebd_users.nick
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT r1.*, ebd_users.profile FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, salesType, salesStatus, imgpath, content, viewcnt, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM ebd_market ORDER BY num DESC) r1, ebd_users WHERE num=#{num} AND r1.writer=ebd_users.nick

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM ebd_market
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'|| #{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'|| #{writer}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ebd_market_heart (num, target_num, writer) VALUES(ebd_market_heart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{nick})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ebd_market_heart WHERE target_num=#{num} AND writer=#{nick}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(r1.heartcnt,0) heartcnt FROM (SELECT target_num, count(*) heartcnt FROM ebd_market_heart GROUP BY target_num) r1, ebd_market e WHERE r1.target_num(+) = e.num and e.num=#{num}

SELECT heartcnt FROM (SELECT r2.heartcnt, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT NVL(r1.heartcnt,0) heartcnt FROM (select target_num, count(*) heartcnt FROM ebd_market_heart GROUP BY target_num) r1, ebd_market e
WHERE (title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%') AND r1.target_num(+) = e.num
WHERE (title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%') AND r1.target_num(+) = e.num
WHERE (e.writer LIKE '%' || #{writer} || '%') AND r1.target_num(+) = e.num
WHERE r1.target_num(+) = e.num
ORDER BY num DESC) r2) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT target_num FROM ebd_market_heart WHERE target_num=#{num} and writer=#{nick}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, salesType, salesStatus, imgpath, content, viewcnt, ebd_market.regdate, profile FROM ebd_market, ebd_users WHERE ebd_market.writer=ebd_users.nick AND ebd_market.writer=#{nick} ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
